thumb.title: Cortina d'Ampezzo: Winds of a Snowboarding Adventure
thumb.description: Second day snowboarding in Cortina d'Ampezzo. The view was unbelievable and the camera doesn't really capture the magic of the place, but here is the video of what I got.0:00 Intro0:55 Chairlift ride1:31 Vitelli Alta (62)4:19 San Marco (73)10:35 Just enjoying the view11:01 Col de Varda (61) + (60)18:34 San Forca (72)20:44 End@HaraldReveryCortina d'Ampezzo, Italy 2024
